file_content.text: This should be the place. Where's Senya?
I'm here.
Sorry. Am I interrupting?
Vaylin...
Save your voice, Mother. You'll need it for screaming later.
You're better than this.
You're always saying that, and you're always wrong.
Outlander! Why don't we crack open that head of yours so Father can come out to play?
My child makes a mockery of herself.
I want to trust you, Senya. Convince me to help your son.
Make your case.
The Emperor you once fought is no more. I can sense the good in him.
[Attack]
It doesn't have to end this way.
I know the pain Valkorion must have inflicted on you, but killing him won't heal your scars.
Rise above your father, Vaylin.
Valkorion sends his regards.
He says hello.
I have no scars!
That's a first.
Sorry I have to miss the family reunion, but I've sent you all a gift. See you soon, Mother.
What are you waiting for?
The fleet has encountered minor complications.
Waahooo!
The Gravestone dilutes our firepower, but we can compensate.
Do it!
We need to work together. Hold Vaylin off, and I'll cleanse Arcann's rage. Then we'll join your fight.
I know my son. If he regains his strength, he will annihilate you and Vaylin in his campaign to retake the throne.
Please, Outlander. If Arcann isn't healed, he'll turn against us all. You need to trust me.
Go to your son, Senya. Ensure that he's healed, and I'll hold off Vaylin's forces as long as I can.
We will save Arcann together.
You won't regret this.
There can be no redemption for the fallen Emperor of Zakuul, abandoned by his mother, poisoned by his father. You have failed him, Senya.
Arcann must die.
I haven't failed him yet.
Lana. Take your Mandalorians, and move on Senya and Arcann. They won't escape me again.
Lana. Take your Mandalorians, and protect the shrine. Senya's counting on us.
Where are you hiding your son?
Where's Arcann?
The Voss are healing him deeper in the shrine.
[Say nothing]
Silence. How very like him.
Valkorion tormented you long enough. Killing him won't heal your scars.
Forget your father, Vaylin.
Get to your son and patch him up. I'll hold off Vaylin's army as long as I can.
We will save Arcann together.
Arcann's time is over, Senya. You've failed him. Now stand aside and watch him die.
Arcann must die.
Quiet, Mother. I wish I'd buried you with the last of your loyal knights on Ord Mantell.
But then I never would have tracked you back to Arcann. Now you can die in each other's arms.
